Name: Velvet Fog
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and grated nutmeg.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
History: Created by Dale DeGroff in New York City.
Nutrition: One serving of Velvet Fog contains 178 calories
